reviewText: I am an early childhood educator.  This is one of my all time favorite films about children.  Kiarostami takes us into the heart of childhood.  A beautiful film!!!

MAGICAL..and...AMUSING. This is a story of a little girl who wants to buy a goldfish. So with her mothers last few dollars sets out to buy  her fish. But then loses the money down a grate in the street, the humor begins, when she trys every which way to retrieve her mothers money.  This DVD is very clear, and is also has very good colour.
